ing: 1/2 red bell pepper, seeded and diced
des: "The ingredients in this salad are so tangy that no salad dressing is needed, keeping the salad light - just how it should be. The sweetness of the red bell peppers complements the feta and cracked pepper so well. Has a kick - great for pepper lovers!"
ins: Place the spinach on a plate or in a bowl. Sprinkle the red pepper and feta cheese over it. Season with cracked black pepper, and enjoy this healthy meal!
